questions.question: How do I register as a farmer?
questions.answer: You can register as a farmer by clicking on the 'I'm a Farmer' button on the homepage and following the registration process.

questions.question: How are payments processed?
questions.answer: Payments are processed securely through our platform. Consumers pay when placing an order, and farmers receive payment after successful delivery.

questions.question: What if there's an issue with my order?
questions.answer: You can report issues through the 'Report an Issue' form in the Support section. Our team will assist you in resolving the issue.
